sentence.Network_en: It is crucial that all documents presented are authentic and easily verifiable.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有提交的文件必须真实且易于查证，这一点很关键。

sentence.Network_cn: 这不是一个不切实际的念头，而是一个可以证明的事实。

sentence.Network_en: Unfortunately, they do not offer any reliable alternative method for obtaining verifiable knowledge.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是, 他们不能提出其他任何可靠的方式来获得可以证实的知识.

entry.def: Something that is verifiable can be proved to be true or genuine.

example.ex: This is not a romantic notion but verifiable fact...
example.tran: 这不是一个不切实际的念头，而是一个可以证明的事实。

example.ex: It is crucial that all documents presented are authentic and easily verifiable.
example.tran: 所有提交的文件必须真实且易于查证，这一点很关键。

means.word_mean: 2. capable of being tested (verified or falsified) by experiment or observation

auth_sentence.content: There is no verifiable answer to this Darwinian crisis.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no verifiable answer to this Darwinian crisis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no verifiable answer to this Darwinian crisis.

auth_sentence.content: The exact number of casualties was not immediately verifiable.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The exact number of casualties was not immediately verifiable.

auth_sentence.content: Homeopathy has failed to produce even one verifiable cure.
